startPage.Text: You are standing in a dark room. There are two doors in front of you.

door1.Text: You open the first door and see a long corridor.

door2.Text: You open the second door and see a flight of stairs leading down.

corridorPage.Text: You walk down the corridor and reach another door.

openDoor.Selector: Open the door at the end of the corridor
openDoor.Text: You open the door and enter a small room with a window.

turnBack.Selector: Turn back and return to the dark room
turnBack.Text: You turn back and head towards the dark room.

stairsPage.Text: You descend the stairs and find yourself in a basement.

explore.Text: You decide to explore the basement and find a hidden door.

goBack.Text: You decide to go back upstairs.

windowPage.Text: Through the window, you see a beautiful garden.

jumpOut.Text: You jump out of the window and land safely in the garden.

stayInside.Selector: Stay inside and look around the room
stayInside.Text: You decide to stay inside and explore the room.

hiddenDoorPage.Text: You find a hidden door behind a bookshelf.

openHiddenDoor.Text: You open the hidden door and find a treasure chest.

leaveHiddenDoor.Selector: Leave the hidden door and continue exploring
leaveHiddenDoor.Text: You decide to leave the hidden door alone.

gardenPage.Text: You are now in a beautiful garden filled with flowers.

exploreGarden.Text: You explore the garden and find a hidden path.

goBackInside.Text: You decide to go back inside the house.
